Uses of Package
com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol

  • Packages that use com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol 
    Package Description
    com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol  
  • Classes in com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol used by com.samsung.android.sdk.mediacontrol 
    Class and Description
    SmcAvPlayer
    This interface provides methods to stream audio and video and to control the audio video player.
    SmcAvPlayer.EventListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for player events.
    SmcAvPlayer.MediaInfo
    This interface provides methods for getting duration information on the currently playing media.
    SmcAvPlayer.PlayInfo
    This class contains a position in a media clip from the beginning of the clip.
    SmcAvPlayer.ResponseListener
    This listener instance provides callback methods for playback response events.
    SmcDevice
    This interface provides methods to get information about a device.
    SmcDeviceFinder
    This class supports finding devices to play audio and video contents, to show images and to provide content.
    SmcDeviceFinder.DeviceListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for when devices join or leave the network.
    SmcDeviceFinder.StatusListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for SmcDeviceFinder status events.
    SmcIcon
    This interface contains information on icons in the Media Control package.
    SmcImageViewer
    This interface provides methods to display images and control the image viewer.
    SmcImageViewer.EventListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for image viewer events.
    SmcImageViewer.ResponseListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for response events.
    SmcItem
    This class represents a media item (audio, video or image) or a folder.
    SmcItem.LocalContent
    This class provides methods for creating an instance of a media resource from content on the local device.
    SmcItem.Resource
    This interface supports content resource management.
    SmcItem.WebContent
    This class provides methods for creating an instance of a media resource from content on the web.
    SmcProvider
    This interface supports content provider management.
    SmcProvider.EventListener
    This listener interface provides callback methods for SmcProvider content provider events.
    SmcProvider.ResponseListener
    This listener interface provides the callback methods for response events.
    SmcProvider.SearchCriteria
    This class contains the search criteria used in the search method.
